property.name: usersync.enabled
property.description: Should users and groups be synchronized to Hue Database? Required to setup Hue policies

property.name: SYNC_SOURCE
property.description: Sync Source

property.name: usersync.unix.minUserId
property.description: Only sync users above this min user id (applicable for UNIX)

property.name: usersync.unix.maxUserId
property.description: Only sync users above this max user id (applicable for UNIX)

property.name: usersync.unix.minGroupId
property.description: Only sync users above this min Group id (applicable for UNIX)

property.name: usersync.unix.maxGroupId
property.description: Only sync users above this max Group id (applicable for UNIX)

property.name: usersync.unix.group.file
property.description: Location of the groups file on the linux server

property.name: usersync.unix.password.file
property.description: Location of the password file on the linux server

property.name: usersync.sleeptimeinmillisbetweensynccycle
property.description: Sleeptime interval in milliseconds, if < 6000 then default to 1 min

property.name: usersync.ldap.base.dn
property.description: The search base for finding users and groups

property.name: usersync.ldap.url
property.description: URL of the LDAP server

property.name: usersync.ldap.nt.domain
property.description: The NT domain used for LDAP authentication

property.name: usersync.ldap.cert
property.description: A PEM-format file containing certificates for the CA's that Hue will trust for authentication over TLS. The certificate for the CA that signed the LDAP server certificate must be included among these certificates. See more here http://www.openldap.org/doc/admin24/tls.html.

property.name: usersync.ldap.use.start.tls
property.description: A PEM-format file containing certificates for the CA's that Hue will trust for authentication over TLS.

property.name: usersync.ldap.bind.dn
property.description: Distinguished name of the user to bind as -- not necessary if the LDAP server supports anonymous searches

property.name: usersync.ldap.bind.password
property.description: Password of the bind user -- not necessary if the LDAP server supports anonymous searches

property.name: usersync.ldap.bind.password.script
property.description: Execute this script to produce the bind user password. This will be used when `bind_password` is not set.

property.name: usersync.ldap.username.pattern
property.description: # Pattern for searching for usernames -- Use (username) for the parameter. # For use when using LdapBackend for Hue authentication

property.name: usersync.ldap.create.users.on.login
property.description: # Create users in Hue when they try to login with their LDAP credentials. # For use when using LdapBackend for Hue authentication

property.name: usersync.ldap.sync.groups.on.login
property.description: Synchronize a users groups when they login

property.name: usersync.ldap.ignore.username.case
property.description: Ignore the case of usernames when searching for existing users in Hue

property.name: usersync.ldap.force.username.lowercase
property.description: # Force usernames to lowercase when creating new users from LDAP. # Takes precedence over force_username_uppercase

property.name: usersync.ldap.force.username.uppercase
property.description: Force usernames to uppercase, cannot be combined with force_username_lowercase

property.name: usersync.ldap.search.bind.authentication
property.description: Use search bind authentication.

property.name: usersync.ldap.subgroups
property.description: Choose which kind of subgrouping to use: nested or suboordinate (deprecated)

property.name: usersync.ldap.nested.members.search.depth
property.description: Define the number of levels to search for nested members.

property.name: usersync.ldap.follow.referrals
property.description: Whether or not to follow referrals

property.name: usersync.ldap.debug
property.description: Enable python-ldap debugging.

property.name: usersync.ldap.debug.level
property.description: Sets the debug level within the underlying LDAP C lib.

property.name: usersync.ldap.trace.level
property.description: Possible values for trace_level are 0 for no logging, 1 for only logging the method calls with arguments, 2 for logging the method calls with arguments and the complete results and 9 for also logging the traceback of method calls.

property.name: usersync.ldap.user.searchfilter
property.description: Base filter for searching for users

property.name: usersync.ldap.user.name.attribute
property.description: The username attribute in the LDAP schema

property.name: usersync.ldap.group.searchenabled
property.description: "# do we want to do ldapsearch to find groups instead of relying on user entry attributes # valid values: true, false # any value other than true would be treated as false # default value: false"

property.name: usersync.ldap.group.searchfilter
property.description: Base filter for searching for groups

property.name: usersync.ldap.group.name.attribute
property.description: The group name attribute in the LDAP schema

property.name: usersync.ldap.group.member.attribute
property.description: The attribute of the group object which identifies the members of the group
